name: Crunchtime (itch) (immi)
description:
A difficult twin-stick shooter made for the Death = Progress themed 2022 Newbie Jam, where the more trouble you run into, the more it helps a dev realize their game needs a few on-the-fly changes.

Credits:

Luke Russell

immi

Nick Araujo (music)

-Note from Luke: 

It was a really great experience collaborating with somebody to make a game as I’ve never done that before. I am really glad with what we were able to accomplish in this game jam time period.

-Note from immi:

This was a lot of firsts for me, first time directly working on a game, and first time having anything to do with the making of music. Glad to finally have a chance to rest after this lol.
